name: I Wanna Decimate The Purple Taisa 2
name_original: I Wanna Decimate The Purple Taisa 2
description:
After The Kid's previous escapades, he came out victorious against the one and only Colonel, but it seems their fight

has yet to come to an end... Storming the gates of the Great Longhener Tower, The Kid must stop his malicious plans

once and for all. Will he be able to truly decimate his mightiest opponent in an epic duel to the death?

"I Wanna Decimate the Purple Taisa 2" is a sequel to "I Wanna Decimate the Purple Taisa" unlike the first game, this is a collaboration work between myself and Skulldude, he made the platforming segment in the game and I was responsible for developing the boss fight. In total the game length is not very long but it is incredibly difficult, featuring a few screens of platforming and a boss fight with 20 attacks in a randomised order.
